resource_dependency.attendanceDataSchema: Database schema: attendance_records(id UUID primary key, employee_id UUID foreign key references employees(employee_id), clock_in TIMESTAMP, clock_out TIMESTAMP, status ENUM('present', 'absent'), created_at TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.employeeAuthAPI: Authentication API handling login/logout with JWT tokens

function: Authenticate and authorize employees accessing the time attendance system.
static_description: A centered login form with username and password fields, a submit button, and a header displaying the company logo. Background color set to papaya whip (#FFEFD5) and all interactive components styled with dark orange (#FF8C00).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button sends credentials to the authentication API endpoint. On success, redirects to the employee dashboard page.
Pressing Enter while focused on either input field triggers submission of the form.

function: Enable authenticated employees to record their arrival time.
static_description: Dashboard contains a large prominent 'Clock In' button aligned center-top with current time displayed above it. All buttons use dark orange background with white text, and the overall background is papaya whip.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the Clock In button calls the /api/v1/attendance/clock-in endpoint with employee ID and current timestamp. Button becomes disabled after successful call until next day reset.

function: Allow authenticated employees to log their departure time.
static_description: Below the Clock In section, there's a clearly labeled 'Clock Out' button also styled with dark orange. It remains disabled unless a corresponding Clock In record exists for the same day.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Clock Out triggers a POST request to /api/v1/attendance/clock-out with employee ID and current timestamp. Updates existing record with clock-out time.

function: Display individual employeeâ€™s historical attendance records.
static_description: Tabbed interface within the dashboard showing a sortable table of past attendance entries with columns Date, Clock-In Time, Clock-Out Time, Status. Styled consistently with papaya whip background and dark orange accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table by that attribute. Clicking refresh reloads latest data from personalAttendanceHistoryEndpoint.

resource_dependency.absenceCalculationLogic: Computed difference between scheduled hours and actual worked hours per period

function: Calculate and display total present and absent times for each employee.
static_description: Summary cards beneath the history table show cumulative attendance metrics including Total Present Hours, Absent Hours, and Percentage Attendance. Cards are visually distinct but follow theme colors.

resource_dependency.adminAuthAPI: Separate admin authentication endpoint validating against admin role claims in JWT token

function: Secure access for administrative users to manage attendance data.
static_description: Dedicated admin login screen identical in layout to employee login but routed separately. Uses same color scheme with additional role-specific styling cues.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting admin credentials routes through adminAuthAPI. Successful authentication grants access to admin dashboard URL.

function: Provide administrators full visibility over team attendance records.
static_description: Fullscreen responsive grid listing all employee attendance logs with filter controls atop. Grid uses alternating row shading under papaya whip theme, actions styled with dark orange.

interaction_and_states.description: Applying filters updates the dataset fetched from allEmployeesAttendanceEndpoint with applied query parameters. Sorting works similarly to employee view.

function: Generate statistical summaries of organizational attendance patterns.
static_description: Dedicated reporting tab featuring charts and KPI widgets summarizing key attendance metrics. Visualizations utilize chart.js or similar library with consistent theming.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting date range and clicking 'Generate Report' fetches aggregated stats from statisticsReportGeneratorAPI and renders results dynamically.

function: Support deeper analytical insights into workforce attendance trends.
static_description: Analysis module presents multi-dimensional trend graphs and heatmaps derived from attendance datasets. Interface mirrors report generator in style and navigation flow.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing different analysis dimensions re-fetches processed data from analysisEngineAPI and redraws visualizations accordingly.

function: Ensure consistent UI branding across entire application using defined palette.
static_description: Entire app wrapped in global stylesheet applying Papaya Whip (#FFEFD5) as base background and Dark Orange (#FF8C00) to actionable elements like buttons and links.

function: Expose RESTful endpoints enabling client-side clock operations with accurate timestamps.
static_description: Backend-defined route handlers accepting structured payloads containing employee IDs and ISO-formatted timestamps for precise logging.

function: Serve filtered and paginated sets of attendance data based on requester permissions.
static_description: Defined GET endpoints returning JSON responses encapsulating arrays of attendance records tailored to requesting user roles.

resource_dependency.developmentServerScript: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
resource_dependency.installAllScript: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend

function: Facilitate unified local development workflow managing both frontend and backend processes.
static_description: Root package.json configured with scripts invoking concurrent execution of respective dev servers and parallel installation commands.
